name: Sunless Skies
summary: Sunless Skies is set in the same Victorian era-inspired fictional world as Fallen London and Sunless Sea. The game is set ten years after the events of Sunless Sea. The player assumes the role of a captain of interplanetary locomotive.
info:
• 中文名: 无光之空
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 发行日期: 2017年8月30日
  • 开发商: Failbetter Games
  • 发行: Failbetter Games
  • 剧本: Chris Gardiner
